workArray.description: At Shopmonkey I work as the sole designer for all projects, on both UI and UX design and together with the team we are responsible for the development of all the customers requests.
While I only worked at Elastique for a shorter period I gained a lot of valuable knowledge about best practices, workflow and design systems.

During my six-month internship at ABN AMRO, one of the leading banks in the Netherlands, I had the opportunity to work with the Private Banking team as a User Experience Design Intern. My main focus was on the revamp of the Design System, aiming to align the Private Banking user experience with the rest of the bank.

During my time as the Commission Chairman for IAM Core's Game Commission, I played a crucial role in organizing and overseeing game events for IAM Core members. As part of the Commission, our primary responsibility was to plan and execute various game-related activities on and off campus.
3 month internship at Creative Agency Lemoncake in Amsterdam-Noord. Here I was mainly involved with CMS management and the design for their portfolio site. [Lemoncake isn't active anymore]
